text: Using Ollama on the command line is very simple. The following are commands, that you can try to run Ollama on your computer. e ollama pull — This command is used to pull a model from the Ollama model hub. e ollama rm — This command is used to remove the already downloaded model from the local computer. e ollama cp — This command is used to make a copy of the model. e ollama list — This command is used to see the list of downloaded models. e ollama run — This command is used to run a model, If the model is not already downloaded, it will pull the model and serve it. e ollama serve — This command is used to start the server, to serve the downloaded models.
